about.title: about
about.description: Lucila Hertzriken is a seasoned executive in the filmmaking industry, renowned for her strategic vision, creative sensibility, and extensive experience in delivering high-impact projects.
about.paragraph2: Over the past 25 years, she has built a solid career in the audiovisual sector, working with renowned talents and companies across Brazil, Argentina, the United States, and Europe.
about.paragraph3: Her expertise spans from creative conception to the execution of complex projects, always with a focus on excellence and innovation.
about.paragraph4: Lucila is known for her ability to unite artistic vision and business strategy, creating unique solutions for each project.
about.paragraph5: With an international network of contacts and partnerships, she facilitates co-productions and collaborations between different markets.
about.paragraph6: Her commitment to quality and innovation makes her a reference in the Brazilian and international audiovisual market.

grochFilms.title: Groch Films
grochFilms.description: A bespoke production company dedicated to co-productions and international services. We specialize in bringing creative visions to life through strategic partnerships and innovative storytelling approaches.

consultancy.title: Consultancy
consultancy.description: Partnering with businesses, projects, and initiatives in content and entertainment. Our expertise spans across project development, production strategy, and market positioning.

learning.title: Learning
learning.description: Providing training and innovation-driven activities. We offer workshops, masterclasses, and educational programs for aspiring filmmakers and industry professionals.

footer.description: Filmmaker & Producer creating compelling visual stories that connect and inspire audiences worldwide.
